Name: Tuft of black fur
Description: Incredibly dark, it is very soft and warm to the touch.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Increíblemente oscuro, es muy suave y cálido al tacto.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 엄청나게 어둡고 만지면 매우 부드럽고 따뜻합니다.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Unglaublich dunkel, es fühlt sich sehr weich und warm an.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Incroyablement sombre, il est très doux et chaud au toucher.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Hihetetlenül sötét, nagyon puha és meleg tapintású.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Incredibilmente scuro, è molto morbido e caldo al tatto.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 信じられないほど暗く、とても柔らかく、手触りが暖かいです。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Incrivelmente escuro, é muito macio e quente ao toque.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Невероятно темный, он очень мягкий и теплый на ощупь.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: İnanılmaz derecede karanlık, dokunulduğunda çok yumuşak ve sıcak.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 令人难以置信的黑暗，触感非常柔软和温暖。
